website_summaries.verdict: A budget priced cycling backpack with a light, aerodynamic design and a comfortable fit.
pros: Dual compartments are large enough for textbooks and laptops
The exterior of the backpack is weatherproof enough to survive a decent amount of rain or snow
cons: The outer zippers are prone to snagging and even coming off at the seams after rough use

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I took this backpack on the river kayaking with me.. unfortunately I didn't realize that it fell off the kayak and floated down the river a couple miles. The impressive thing is that I had multiple items inside. Including a Bose Bluetooth speaker, a rechargable battery pack, cell phone, wallet and knife. All combined was an efficient amount of weight to sink the backpack. Fortunately the next day a good samaritan had found my backpack and returned. There was NO DAMAGE to any items inside. With the exception of cancelling my credit cards.. I couldn't have asked for a better outcome. Would highly recommend this backpack even before my kayaking incident.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby T

customer_reviews.title: Great cycling bag
customer_reviews.text: I ride my mountain bike way out in the woods, so a needed a bag with room for extras. When I'm going on a long ride far from everything, I like to be prepared :) I have some tools that don't fit in my under-saddle bag, snacks, bug spray, and keys, plus the water bladder. It all fits nicely and the backpack is comfortable. So far it has been great and it seems really sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: crabbygirl

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: The pack is 1 lb 4 oz on my kitchen scale. Color is true. It feels somewhat small for a few hiking essentials and extra layers. I like the side and bottom pockets, and that's the reason I got it. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: jmumv

customer_reviews.title: Big enough
customer_reviews.text: A lot of compartimenrs, for people who use to run on trail races I think might be too much because is a big backpack compared with anothe brands thatvare specialized. It doesnt include the bag dor water. I already had one and ir keeps it fresh enough but if you like realy cold water I will recomend you but an isulates backpack
customer_reviews.author: Luz Ma. Carreño

customer_reviews.title: Great little day pack.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for day hikes. I carry a lot of camera equipment in a backpack/camera bag. My girlfriend uses this to carry 2-4 bottles of water, rain suits, first aid kit and a few snacks. Just the right size for use. lots of pockets. I would purchase again if we lost it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Totally perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my seven year-old and she Loves it. It is a little bit big for her even with the straps synched all the way. But it fits a liter water bladder perfect, she also packs an extra set of size 7 girls clothes, light rain jacket and some snacks. Everything fits great. All the difference pockets make it easy to grab and go. She loves the pink color and reflective hints. She is also super happy about the whistle in the chest buckle. Her first trial with it was a three hour hike 800 feet elevation and she carried it the whole way even ran with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tomme M. Hough

customer_reviews.title: Had to buy a second for my Fiancee so he would stop using mine!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for beginner hikers/cyclers (my level). Used this for a few hikes and a few bike rides. Holds everything I need, including a 2 liter bladder, snacks, tools. Can hold a small jacket if need be. Its size is the perfect happy medium. Does not come with the bladder (this might be in the info and I missed it) but will fit any kind you buy. It is set up so that the hose comes out of the main pack and through the strap so it lays secure.
customer_reviews.author: larussaa

customer_reviews.title: ... this backpack for about 3 years already and I like it. Bought it
customer_reviews.text: I have this backpack for about 3 years already and I like it. Bought it, to use it, as a day backpack when traveling. Most of the time I use it for hiking and you can fit a lot of stuff inside, the water pack, snacks, first aid kit, bug repellent, extra shirt, etc, everything you need for a day hike. Will definitely buy it again, if it is still available in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: Used primarily for cycling but also running. Last bag was a camel Bak sack pack. That bag was definitely more comfortable while running, but the compartments and tougher material win the day for me. The other concern I have with this bag is the zippers. There are very smooth but not very heavy duty. I'm conscious of how tight I pack it for fear of breaking a zipper. Bottle holders on side work great. I like the spacer against my back that keeps sweat from soaking in to the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Krejci

customer_reviews.title: Great small pack
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my trip to Hawaii last week, lots of compliments on the style/color. Perfect small size for women. Be aware this is smaller than a normal backpack but can easily hold a towel, swimsuit, flipflops, snorkel gear, phone, etc. Lots of pockets. Great straps for securing when hiking. Very versatile. Held up great, used daily for 9 days.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to travel/multi-pitch climbing pack. It's streamlined but roomy, so I can put my computer, cords, camera, and books in it to carry on the plane (even fits under the seat) and then use it as a multi-pitch pack when I climb. Just the right size to hold all everything I need but not so big that it makes it cumbersome to climb with. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I needed a backpack for commuting back and forth from work etc. This is perfect. I put a few hardback books in here. It has room left over for a change of clothes and snacks. The water bottle pockets are good and strong. The zippers are good quality and work smoothly. The mesh helmet accessory is a nice added touch which I use. I feel this bag will last me a long time. I plan to use use it for hiking as well. This is a perfect bag for commuting or hiking. It's a great size. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: love this so far
customer_reviews.text: love this so far. its been to nicaragua for tourist and light hiking. been camping light hiking twice and i use it often around town. holds a water bladder well. the bladder that came with it leaked after the first washing. backpack itself washed well in the washing machine with air dry. fits a woman nicely. good first light day pack until i get an osprey in a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Funstuff

customer_reviews.title: The size is perfect for packing food
customer_reviews.text: The item is exactly as pictured, I use for mountain biking.The size is perfect for packing food, tool, small high pressure pump, the water bag and emergency kit. It does not come with a rain cover (I think it is water repellent), but have a helmet net.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: update....they sent me a new bag!!!!i love this bag but had it barely a month and ...
customer_reviews.text: i love this bag but had it barely a month and zipper broke on small front pocket. VERY DISAPPOINTING went from 5 to 1 so very quick. if they make up for it i will change my review . .UPDATE.......THEY SENT ME A BRAND NEW BAG!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: secretraveler V

customer_reviews.title: Nice style, comfortable, and holds quite a bit of stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Nice hiking and cycling backpack. Holds quite a bit of stuff despite its apparent small size. The seams and zippers seem durable. It rides nicely on your back with comfortable straps. It does look pretty cool as well. The only drawback is that it has a cardboard (?) and egg crate plastic piece that rests against your back, it isvery comfortable but doesn't breath much which means your back is sopping with sweat and then this thing gets very stinky. I wash mine weekly or earlier if I am going to be using it around others because if I don't the smell is overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: First...yes I know the helmet will attach to the backpack lol but I was just being lazy haha. This bag is awesome! Perfect size tons of storage compartments and places to put everything o need for my daily commute to work! I does not make me hot at all (currently 85 degrees). I really like the chest and waist straps, truly makes a huge difference. I bring a few shirts, my lunch, a Gatorade, my coffee travel mug and all my misc...phone, wallet, keys etc without issues.
customer_reviews.author: DrDetail

customer_reviews.title: Nice Design but Quality is terrible
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice pack but it failed on the first trip. The stitching ripped away between the main and secondary pocket. Quality is terrible. Also the chest strap is held on by a clip that holds to a cord. The left side came out but I was able to wedge the clip apart and put it back on. I knew the pack was inexpensive but was hoping to get more than one use out of it. I am asking the seller for a replacement and will update my review if the replacement performs better.
customer_reviews.author: GBSIII

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made + well designed + unbeatable price
customer_reviews.text: That a backback this well engineered and manufactured can be available for less than $35 is one of those hard to explain miracles of modern international trade. It is of course made in China (but what isn’t, these days, as far as camping and hilking gear is concerned?); still, the quality of the details, the very convincing ergonomy and the finishing touches are remarkable. I bought this one for my wife, and at 18 liter capacity, it is perfect for a longer day hike while remaining easy to carry and quite stylish.
customer_reviews.author: P. Holtzweiler

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I really love this backpack! It's exactly the size that I wanted and it's super comfortable. I use it daily, but bought it to use on my bicycle. It works great at the pool and for all of my triathlon training! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wahrer

customer_reviews.title: Good for use as a swim bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is comfortably padded to wear walking to a pool a couple miles from my house. The pockets are handy because I can keep swimwear and towel in the main pouch and sunscreen, money for lap swim, and toiletries in the other pockets. And you can strap your water bottles in to the side pockets by unbuckling the orange straps, putting them through a loop in the water bottle, and then buckling the strap together. Keeps the water bottles from falling out if you are running.
customer_reviews.author: Tanis Coralee Leonhardi

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great to hold everything I need to bring on my Wednesday lunch rides. Having 3 storage pockets to seperate clothes/tools and glasses/food, and having the two water bottle pockets works great. There's a little net for keeping your helmet from flopping around. There's even a little whistle attached to the chest strap. I've used it for about a month and it's holding up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: B. Felsher

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not its strong point.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this bag. I like the colors, the styling, all the pockets, easy to open zippers, etc. but the quality of this bag is questionable. After a month of use it started to fall apart. I don’t think this will last a full year. I don’t use it every day or use it in a harsh manner. You can see where the fabric is coming apart in my photo. I’m afraid this will happened to all the stitching. Does this bag have a warranty?!
customer_reviews.author: WaywardSon

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It already has a few holes in it, I ordered it on May 20th and it is now October 1st. So, I got what I paid for. It is a tad bit small, doesn't comfortably fit a folder/school supplies. The water bottle pockets have holes in them and so do some of the layers between pockets, but it is definitely still usable. I will probably keep it for one more biking season.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Grahek

customer_reviews.title: I saw some complaints about this pack but don't believe them!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent cycling pack. It works great with my bladder and not only that, it has room for the bladder cooler too. It's plenty roomy but compact enough that it works great for cycling and backpacking. I use it pretty much every day. Nothing has failed on it and the color remains vibrant. It's a very good pack and I'm super satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Mc Kee

customer_reviews.title: Decent Commuting Bag
customer_reviews.text: I like the bag. I use it to commute home (around 20 miles) after taking the bus (it has a bike rack) downtown. It’s tight, but I can wedge my work clothes (button down, tie, pants, shoes, belt) into the bag and ride relatively unencumbered as it sits a bit low in the back. This is what I wanted the bag to do and it does. Elastic to secure the dangling straps would be nice, but it’s no big deal to tuck them.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny McNicebreath

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, fits nice. However, it tears easily over time. It’s nice for a simple ride with snacks and water. It’s durability won’t hold anything with an edge or with weight without tearing.
customer_reviews.author: BankOfBur

customer_reviews.title: Okay for price, pretty flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Not the best bag, very thing for as much as it can hold. I like the drink holders on the side, very convenient. The chest clip is flimsy and broke off which doesnt help much if you're using it outdoors. Not my favorite
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack for my hiking trips
customer_reviews.text: I wear this backpack for all my short hiking trips and it is fantastic! Super comfortable and fits all my essentials. I love the chest and stomach straps that help keep the backpack from bouncing when I run on trails. Definitely recommend this backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Good until clasp came off
customer_reviews.text: Good back pack. Lots of pockets and light. Used it pretty much on most of my bike rides past 3 weeks. I got the orange color so I am visible to traffic behind me. Couple of days back the buckle on the chest strap left side came off. I'm trying to put it back in but its not easy. I would have given 5 stars if it wasnt for the clasp coming off
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Strap breaks off when tightening!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this back pack the first time I used it, but the second time I used it, I tried to tighten the strap across my chest and the straps popped right off. I feel like it would be fixable if I could somehow fasten back on, but right now it's unusable because it won't stay on my body while biking. Now I have to buy another one and I will not be buying this same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Padding Smells bad and not well glued together
customer_reviews.text: Large bag and has plenty of storage for great price. Very thin and light weight. The orange padding system really off gasses and smells horrible after 1 month. REALLY BAD SMELL to the point I no longer will use it! The orange padding strips came unglued and slide all over the place too
customer_reviews.author: Bohdi

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and durable
customer_reviews.text: I use this while commuting to work on my bicycle. It is very lightweight and seems durable. It has plenty of room for my lunch and a change of underclothes. It secures nicely and doesn't move around while I'm riding. I hardly notice that its there. I have only ridden in light rain, so I can't attest to how well it keeps stuff dry in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: R. Tryon

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, can easily break
customer_reviews.text: Product is made cheap and break easily. the second day it broke the straps are flimsy and material is thin. Do not buy this product it’s junk
customer_reviews.author: Christian Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Surprised with this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. First it came early as in I just got it today the 3 of July. Second I mainly got it for going back and forth to work. Mainly for carrying lunch and extra water bottles as well as some extra stuff for work. Third I'm a short person as in around 4'9 to 5'0 and this sits comfortly on my shoulders and back. That's without my normal things inside. I'm very excited to use it and now what to go for a long bike ride just because.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Gawron

customer_reviews.title: Merchandise malfunction.
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered the LOCALLION Cycling Backpack and I have used it twice, today being the second time, and it malfunctioned. One of the ends that holds the top strap in place came loose making it impossible to secure the chest strap. I am not at all pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Phillips

customer_reviews.title: I would have kept this because it had great compartments. But
customer_reviews.text: I would have kept this because it had great compartments. But, I am very petite with small shoulders and found that even adjusting the straps, they were loose. I plan of getting a kids backpack.
customer_reviews.author: PreciousLollie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - Not the least bit waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Backpack is great on a sunny day, but I am extremely disappointed that the bag is not in the least bit waterproof, which is why I chose this particular backpack over others. A short, light rain leaked straight through, and ruined some items I had inside. Even condensation from the water bladder leaks through to the outside. I will have to put items in plastic bags inside backpack to protect them if there is any chance of rain.
customer_reviews.author: cdburdick

customer_reviews.title: Not good for womens bodies
customer_reviews.text: Could not wear this backpack. The strap cuts directly across the chest area. Not a comfortable place for women. Other quality backpacks I have are higher which avoids this problem. Shoulder straps could not be adjusted properly. Hugh gap even when straps are tightest. Horrible design for women's bodies!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good hiking backpack
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for hiking. It is lightweight and just the right size to fit a couple water bottles, hammock, bug spray, and a book. Appreciate the variety of pockets and it’s breathable / cool for hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Fezzey

customer_reviews.title: No place to hang a taillight
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for bike commuting but then saw there was no place to hang a taillight, and no helmet hook. The material and construction seem very flimsy as well so I am returning it unused. I thought the price seemed too low for a sturdy pack, and I was right.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We live in Colorado so we should have purchased sooner but I bought these for our summer vacation to Disney world and it was the best. We packed umbrella flash light rain coat snacks water night glow sticks snacks fans little water spray bottles caps phones and it was perfect. Not heavy at all and we were always prepared!!
customer_reviews.author: LLA

customer_reviews.title: Careful when tightening straps!
customer_reviews.text: The chest strap pulled free from left side the first time I tightened the strap. Now I can't get it back on. I love the size, tho! It's perfect for my jog to and from the gym...but it is uncomfortable without the chest strap now; it rides up on my body so the handle at top rubbed my neck the entire time.
customer_reviews.author: Brandle68

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable as a hydration  pack,  Due to design flaws.
customer_reviews.text: This pack causes you to sweat greatly. After months of a wear the pack on the inside began to tear. Also where the hydration pack sits at the bottom caused my bladder to deteriorate and split open.
customer_reviews.author: Sea View

customer_reviews.title: 100% will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I use this when I ride my motorcycle. It’s lasted so long . Lots of space and works like it’s supposed to. Literally no complains and super durable 100% will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Honest reviews

customer_reviews.title: Backpack for biking
customer_reviews.text: I got this backpack to carry my 35mm camera with me when biking. So far it satisfies my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Perrigo

customer_reviews.title: Its Amazing. Should be over $150
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of riding and got this bag as a backup. Turns out it's better than all my really expensive bags. It's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Brian G.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Love it, but exchanged for the orange color. I would buy it again in any color.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Durability issues on first trek
customer_reviews.text: I was bummed when I went on my 13 mile daypack on a first time trip with this pack. The chest strap came off the front and is very difficult to add back on. The side strap ripped off. My pack was packed very light as it was for a daypack. All and all I was excited to get this pack after searching for a while. I’m hoping something can be done for a replacement. It’s a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Camon H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for wearing while on my motorcycle. Not too big, not too small...Lots of pockets. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G V

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice back pack. Lots of room. Very light many straps for adjustments
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: Missing zipper
customer_reviews.text: The bag seems like it will get the job done but unfortunately my is missing a zipper and one of the compartments can't be opened. I'm not sure who to contact but hope this review will get the issue resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great bike commuting backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of bike commuting and this backpack is light, comfortable and roomy! It's specifically made for cyclists and that makes all the difference. I've gone through a lot backpacks to finally get to this one! This is what I've been looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, perfect size, lots of compartments, straps on well so I don’t even notice it when I ride.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! Just make sure you order the water bladder for it because it doesn't come with one.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: I love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. It’s perfect for the on the go adventure lover. It holds everything I need and stays secure with the upper straps and the lover ones. Aces.
customer_reviews.author: Deek

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and fit
customer_reviews.text: Great bag used it to hike Mt Whitney it was the perfect size for that day trip couldn’t be more happy with it. Can’t wait to use it on the bike and other adventures. I am 6ft1 and 200lbs this bag fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Strap and zipper broke within 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit and seemingly sturdy design but a strap and zipper broke within 2 months. :-( Really sad it didn’t last longer
customer_reviews.author: LReinert

customer_reviews.title: and we liked it so much my girlfriend wanted her own so ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these a while back, and we liked it so much my girlfriend wanted her own so we got another in a different color. Excellent for biking, hiking, and whatever else you want. No issues at all, lots of fun colors, great bag for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan B

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice, but small
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was going go be a little bigger, small for a bigger guy
customer_reviews.author: Nate Hardy

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for a pack that is normal size this isnt for you.
customer_reviews.text: Its smaller then I wanted. However the fit is great,and i like the waist straps because it keeps it secure when i ride on my cbr 600. No flapping around.
customer_reviews.author: Jc41

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for theme parks!!
customer_reviews.text: Took it to Disney and it was great for all day!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter in law for christmas.. she wore it snowmaching all winter and loved it
customer_reviews.author: GrammaT

customer_reviews.title: I love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! With a 2L bladder it doesn't fit too much in the main compartment, but without the bladder it fits a lot! I only with the small compartment on the front was bigger - its not quite big enough to put in my Credit Card/ID...
customer_reviews.author: Haleigh

customer_reviews.title: Nice design but ripped too easily
customer_reviews.text: I actually really like the bag pack. It’s light and has lots of places to put your stuf, and other items to attach eg bike locks. Unfortunately the material separating the main and secondary compartment ripped rather early on, hence only three stars
customer_reviews.author: Probably

customer_reviews.title: Bag looked great but fit super weird
customer_reviews.text: Bag looked great but fit super weird. I am about 5'4 and weigh 130 pounds and the straps on the shoulders near the armpits stuck out super weird no matter how much I adjusted the straps on all areas. We also didn't realize when purchasing them that they did not include the bladder. So this was a no go for us. The shoulders fit slightly weird on my husband also. Slightly frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks. Lots of pockets and space for this compact backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown Soldier

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag. Used it for cedar point
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag. Used it for cedar point. Plenty big enough for what i needed but small enough to not be a hassel. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not to use for dirt bike riding.  . .
customer_reviews.text: Was too small for avg man if u wearing a coat.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Very functional and lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: A bit smaller than I expected but this is a PERFECT day pack size.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine M. Tsai

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: The first day it ripped, it gets dirty to quick the strings are not long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Yazmin

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: I use this while riding my motorcycle and it breaths great against my back. Great size and tons of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R.

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack, so great bought a second in case 1st wears out!
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack, fits great. Wonderful for cycling and walking around all day sightseeing.
customer_reviews.author: S. Weitz

customer_reviews.title: Great pack for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great pack for a long ride or a mixed ride/hike. The helmet holder us handy. The pack can hold a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for sport activity
customer_reviews.text: Using it when roller skating. Perfect size, perfect weight, good design and the most important for me, breathable when I'm sweating. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jerzy K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for hiking and biking, i do wish it came with a water bladder but i use this everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Is what it is
customer_reviews.text: Love it , it does what I want it to
customer_reviews.author: Christopher R.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: The color is exactly the same as the photo which you don't often to find. I am extremely pleased with the quality being very durable.
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack perfect for bike riding doesn’t drag or get in the way and is roomy enough to carry all my essentials
customer_reviews.author: Monyrodz

customer_reviews.title: Zippers work!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the few with working zippers. Smaller than I had originally thought. Barley room for change of clothes and small lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Jayson and Darlene Hines

customer_reviews.title: Many Pockets
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backpack for hiking or traveling without being too enormous. My tablet fits nicely in the flat pocket closest to my back. You can fit a summer change of clothes in here but not winter clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Katie R.

customer_reviews.title: I really like this backpack
customer_reviews.text: I really like this backpack, the color combo, trim many storage pockets, comfort to wear and use. Very well made. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rmfisherlady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag
customer_reviews.text: Have used this bag twice and it is very well put together. This is my 2nd purchase of the bag and the they feel great on the back and is exactly what I was looking for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Rain resistant
customer_reviews.text: Nice and comfortable. I ride a lot of miles on my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: tons of great, smart placed pockets
customer_reviews.text: Big enough, small enough, light weight, tons of great, smart placed pockets.Solid solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Schneur Holzman

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight for Bike Riding
customer_reviews.text: Perfect back pack for long bike rides. It packs a lot of stuff. It's light weight and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jafar A.

customer_reviews.title: Too long if you're short
customer_reviews.text: I am only 5'2" and this pack was way too long on my back. If you're a tall person would fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie M

customer_reviews.title: Great bicycling backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Great bicycling backpack that fits my daily riding essentials and a little food.
customer_reviews.author: Keenan Polanco

customer_reviews.title: Great pack for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great pack for the price. Does well on a light jog.
customer_reviews.author: Joo Yun Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and reflective
customer_reviews.text: I use this backpack everyday it's awesome I just wish it came with the water bag
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice lightweight. Plenty of room and sections for diff items . Good material.
customer_reviews.author: Mani Mohtadi

customer_reviews.title: I love it! But it broke at the seam :(
customer_reviews.text: I've had my pack for 1 month and there's a tear at one of the seams. I'm so sad because this is my first hydropack and I am an avid hiker.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great pack but...
customer_reviews.text: Great pack but the bladder did not come with it, fortunately my local wall world had one for an additional $18
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great "little" backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little backpack! It fits WAY more than I'd expect a "small" backpack like this to hold. It also has a outside mesh holder if you need to carry a soccer ball or rolled up sweatshirt.
customer_reviews.author: Onnie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, as shown in picture. A little smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.author: E. L.

customer_reviews.title: Descent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything besides the lining between compartments unstitched making 2 compartments merge together.
customer_reviews.author: Keith LaFetra

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Use for road biking. Great design and features. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: jason p. hooper

customer_reviews.title: It is as described
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. I use it for bicycling and it doesn't not slide around and fits comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Regina C.

customer_reviews.title: Overall very nice pack
customer_reviews.text: Are used this backpack for cycling. It was awesome. Very lightweight and didn't make my back all hot and sweaty. One thing I will say though, I'm a very busty woman and the front strap snapped off a couple times. But it's easy to pop back on and adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Kiana Colberg

customer_reviews.title: Its not as big as it looks.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is smaller than expected. The picture looks like the bag has ample room.
customer_reviews.author: Queeno

product_meta.title: LOCALLION Cycling Backpack Bike Pack Outdoor Daypack Running 18L
feature_bullets: VERSATILE: This backpack is an ideal sport backpack for all kinds of outdoor activities such as cycling, jogging, climbing, hiking, traveling, etc. It can be used as a reliable and versatile companion for your short journey or your sporting experience and daily use, also a great gift for everyone.

BREATHABLE & COMFORTABLE: Breathable back material is specially padded with mesh for maximum comfort and heat dissipation. Adjustable mesh shoulder straps with plentiful sponge padding help relieve the stress from your shoulder. The waist straps are designed to facilitate stress release and to ensure stability while cycling.

CONVENIENT DESIGN: External storage system: 1 external pocket with high capacity for umbrella, cell phone, key and other necessities, 1 upper zipper pocket for lighter and other small items, 1 zip pocket for helmet hood, 2 mesh pockets on both sides to carry bottles; Internal storage system: 1 compartment with open pocket you can carry water bladder (NO WATER BLADDER INCLUDED), 1 main compartment.; On the shoulder strap, there is an access for drinking hose and headphones.

SECURITY GUARANTEE: The front and shoulder straps have reflective strips to keep safe in the night. With a whistle on the chest strap, you can use it in events of emergency. All of those designs gonna makes you have a nice and safe trip.

DURABLE: Made of high quality water-proof material, provides extra strength and long-lasting performance with the lightest weight possibly. Can be used for a long serving life. NOTE: Water bladder, rain cover, mobile phone, camera in the picture are not included.
